title: BlueSphere MDM
requestDemoContent: Want to know how BLueSphere can be used in your enterprise mobile device management? Get a free demo of BlueSphere MDM to start a new experience in device management.
noProfessionFound: Didn't find your profession? Contact BlueSphere
deviceManageTitle: BlueSphere helps you manage Android devices in your business
quicManageDesc: Zero-contact registration can perform contactless device registration in batches, quickly deploy thousands of devices, and remotely configure the functions of Android devices in batches through configuration templates, which will take effect in real time. Simple but not simple!
contentPermissionTitle: Device access to application content permissions
remoteManageTitle: Remote device management, monitoring and diagnosis
fileDeployTitle: Real-time deployment of applications and files
contactTitle: Hearing is believing, seeing is believing, come and experience it for yourself
